item.title: Weekly street cleaning missed!, 19th December
item.description:
Sutherland Road, Edmonton has been missed again for weekly street sweeping due Wednesday! The entire road both sides is covered in bottles, wet leaves covered in dog waste, and food waste. Will be great to get this cleared before Christmas. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Sutherland Road, Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Selling a vehicle with an expired MOT illegally in a residential road, 19th December
item.description:
Vehicle has not MOT For sale with only a mobile listed in the windows (illegal) Taking up spaces of residents and is in poor condition Is not legally on the road and shouldn’t be for sale without the permits to sell Outside 28 Parked on Purrett Road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Purrett Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weekly street cleaning missed!, 19th December
item.description:
Scheduled weekly street cleaning has been missed again due to be swept every Wednesday. The entire road is covered in rotting food waste, empty bottles, packaging etc Please can we get this cleared before Christmas. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1A, Findon Road, Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Motorbikes driving through park, 19th December
item.description:
I have had two recent interactions with people driving motorbikes through Allen Gardens. This is obviously incredibly dangerous for children, people and pets who use this space. Is it possible to put up bollards at the entrances to prevent this?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bethune Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deepening pothole between kerb and speed hump in Honor Oak Park / corner of Hengrave Road, 19th December
item.description:
Pothole has been here for years and has been steadily deteriorating; it is now deep and dangerous - the road beyond the pothole (going up the hill) is also extremely uneven and getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Park, Forest Hill, Greater London
